subject: RE: [junit] testing Exception subclasses
msgSnippet: You may override standard streams using System.setIn (PrintStream), System.setOut (PrintStream) and System.setErr (PrintStream). This way you may control
messageBody:
You may override standard streams using System.setIn (PrintStream),
System.setOut (PrintStream) and System.setErr (PrintStream). This way you
may control anything printed out or input from the standard streams.

--oleg
